Sanctified Revival.name: Sanctified Revival
Sanctified Revival.flavor: A halo appears around your head, shining with bright golden light. A fallen ally is lifted up and healed by the heavenly light.
Sanctified Revival.target: One dead or dying ally in the burst
Sanctified Revival.effect: The target is restored to maximum hit points, ends any one effect on him or her that a save can end, and stands up. Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and all defenses.
